item.title: Average is Over
item.description: Average is Over Target Predicting Pregnancy When technology makes things abundant, the winners will be what is scarce

item.title: Geographic Concentrations of Talent Are Increasing
item.description: Geographic Concentrations of Talent Are Increasing The [[European Union|EU]] has massive talent pools moving to Germany and other bustling situations. We expected economic integration, but we are also gutting many cities, concentrating the talent into even smaller areas.

item.title: Paying Politicians High Salaries Reduces Corruption in Singapore
item.description: Paying Politicians High Salaries Reduces Corruption in Singapore They are paid so well that they don’t need to be corrupt to have a comfortable living

item.title: The Winner of Trade is Based Off Class
item.description: The Winner of Trade is Based Off Class High skilled labors win from trade, low skilled laborers lose.
